sinhala maw piya depalakata dawa upan ma kuda kalama ammatath thaththatath karadara dun kelleki.sahodarayin dedeneku ha sahodariyan dedeneku samaga itha sathutin duppath jiwithayak gatha kalemi.eda wela kamata pawa nothibunu apahata,amma gedaraka wadak karagena ena bath patha ka wara ananthaya.kudawata thibu mati biththi niwasa api siw denage maligaya wiya.kanna nathath api sathutin jiwath wunemu.ekese upan bawa kata pirennata amma guti bata dunnaya.ee kisiwakata nowe pasal yannath dath madinnatathya.niwase sara wadima daruwa ma bawa hamoma kiyannata gaththe mage ka්riyawan nisa wiya hakiya.ma kisiwekuta biya wuye natha.karana hama wadama pirisiduwata kirimata ma aasa kalemi.niwase api sawoma dinen dina wadiwiyata piya naguwada duppathkama ethanama wiya.ma hata eya supurudu deyak bawata pathwi thibuni.wasara 12 wana wita ma maranaya langata gos nawatha pamini ayekmi.maleriya uwadura ma siw warak wela gaththeya.me sama witama mage pihita mage raththaran amma wiya.usas adhyapanaya hadara wishwa widyalayata athulath wimata waram lada ma hata mage amma siyalu wiyadam sapaya dunnaya.
